experiences.description:
Kunstuniversität  

 
Textile Surface is a course about doing 
experiments on the surface of materials. In this 
course, I start from my cultural background, 
the traditional paper cutting of 'Xǐ'. From here, 
I tried different techniques and finally made a 
bag from this Chinese character.
This is a traditional Chinese character ' 囍 ' (Xǐ). Even 
now, when people get married, they will buy or cut 
this word with red paper and stick on doors, walls and 
windows to have best wishes for the couple. For its 
Bag made from ' 囍 ' (Xǐ).
special structure, it can be cut in a special method to 
make it symmetry. I cut the ' 囍 ' with fabric and then 
use sugar to harden it. Later I hang it up to dry, and 
this is what I got, a very special structure. And I make 
a shopping bag from this Chinese character together 
with the hardening technique.

experiences.description:
Material Exploration is one aspect of my thesis researching. 
I made a lot of experiment to develop the starch-based 
bioplastic as well as the material made by cofee grounds. 
During the exploration, I developed my own recipes about 
making bioplastic and cofee grounds mat. I also do 
experiments to evaluate the materials. This researching will 
help me to do further exploration of my thesis.
